sense.gloss: near, close, beside, vicinity, proximity, besides, while
while (doing), in addition to, at the same time
listening (to a lecture, hearing, parliament session, etc.), attending (without participating), sitting in (e.g. on a meeting), observing
looking on, standing by and watching, sitting back and watching, remaining a spectator
marks or dots written alongside a word to indicate stress or draw the reader's attention, emphasis mark
guiding marks written beside kanji to facilitate reading of kanbun

sdata.j: ↑駅↑↓えき↓の↑傍↑↓はた↓に↑住↑↓す↓む↑便利↑↓べんり↓さに↑対↑↓たい↓してあなたはお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑払↑↓はら↓っているのです。
sdata.e: You pay for the convenience of living near a station.

sdata.j: よりよいサービスのため、お↑客↑↓きゃく↓さまのお↑電話↑↓でんわ↓は↑傍受↑↓ぼうじゅ↓されることがあります。
sdata.e: In order to serve you better, your call may be monitored.

sdata.j: ↑裁判官↑↓さいばんかん↓は↑傍聴↑↓ぼうちょう↓↑人↑↓じん↓に↑静寂↑↓しじま↓にするように↑命↑↓めい↓じた。
sdata.e: The judge charged the audience to be silent.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑門↑↓もん↓の↑傍↑↓はた↓に↑駐車↑↓ちゅうしゃ↓した。
sdata.e: I parked my car by the gate.

sdata.j: ↑時々↑↓ときどき↓、↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑家↑↓か↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓がテレビの↑討論↑↓とうろん↓↑会↑↓かい↓に↑出↑↓で↓て↑傍聴↑↓ぼうちょう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑押↑↓お↓さえつけようとする↑場面↑↓ばめん↓をみる。
sdata.e: Sometimes, one of the politicians can be seen trying to keep the audience's opinions under control during televised debates.

sdata.j: ↑出席↑↓しゅっせき↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓が↑少↑↓すく↓なくなりつづけ、↑実際↑↓じっさい↓にやってきた↑人↑↓ひと↓も↑無関心↑↓むかんしん↓に↑傍観↑↓ぼうかん↓していた。
sdata.e: Attendance had been falling off and such people as did come sat about indifferently.

sdata.j: ↑世間↑↓せけん↓はいつまでこれらの↑暴虐↑↓ぼうぎゃく↓を↑傍観↑↓ぼうかん↓し↑続↑↓つづ↓けるのか。
sdata.e: How long can the world stand by and watch these atrocities?

sdata.j: ↑当事↑↓とうじ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑結構↑↓けっこう↓↑評価↑↓ひょうか↓しているけど、↑傍目↑↓はため↓↑八↑↓はち↓↑目↑↓もく↓とはいえ、↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑厳↑↓きび↓しい↑見方↑↓みかた↓があたっているかもね。
sdata.e: You speak pretty highly of him, but you're directly involved. I think my less charitable view might be more accurate since I can look at things objectively.

sdata.j: ↑判事↑↓はんじ↓は↑傍聴↑↓ぼうちょう↓↑人↑↓じん↓に↑静↑↓しず↓かにするよう↑警告↑↓けいこく↓した。
sdata.e: The judge bound the spectators to keep quiet.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はただ↑傍観↑↓ぼうかん↓するだけでそのけんかを↑止↑↓と↓めなかった。
sdata.e: He just looked on and didn't stop the quarrel.

words.gloss: near, close, beside, vicinity, proximity, besides, while
listening (to a lecture, hearing, parliament session, etc.), attending (without participating), sitting in (e.g. on a meeting), observing
